name: StartupBase
overview:
In recent years the Brazilian technological entrepreneurship has gained international significance, attracting more investment and achieve significant results. In addition, many young people already see the act of taking as an opportunity for personal growth and personal satisfaction by doing what they like and develop high impact solutions.

A segment is the highlight of startups, which are groups of people looking for a repeatable business model and scalable, working in conditions of extreme uncertainty. We closely follow several significant movements seeking to leverage this ecosystem in Brazil, many of them extremely successful.

StartupBase’s proposal is to assist in this process of knowledge of Brazilian startups, so that the information provided here can help in prospecting for new business investors, mentors, consultants, and entrepreneurs who are interested in being part of creating an innovative product.

We want to become the main source of information on Brazilian startups.

external_links.title: Startups brasileiras adaptam ideias do exterior para o gosto brasileiro
Una red social para conectar a las startups de Brasil
